items.value: A storm has come in %01@. It is devastating the kingdom and its production. The kingdom is put on lock down.
The storm finally passed but it left damages to %01@. The storm damaged about %106% percent of the kingdom.
%12@ of %11@ sent %10@ to give relief goods to %01@.
%02@ of %01@ received the relief goods sent by %12@ of %11@. %87a is very much grateful for the help.
%22@ of %21@ sent %20@ to intercept relief goods in %01@.
%20@ has been discovered intercepting the relief goods for %21@. %12@ and %02@ is infuriated by this action.
%01@ successfully receovered from the storm's devastation.
